Test.Name: Get Node(s) under Test
Test.Description: Identifies all nodes on the network using VerifyNodeID

TestObjective.Objective: Send global Verify Node ID Message Network Layer Message
TestObjective.Results: Verified Node ID from all nodes on the network

Test.Name: Alias Map Enquiry
Test.Description: Tests target for correct implementation of the Alias Map Enquiry (AME) Message

TestObjective.Objective: Send AME message with no CAN data
TestObjective.Results: Receive Alias Map Definition (AMD) from all nodes on the network

TestObjective.Objective: Send AME message with Full Node ID of node under test in the data payload
TestObjective.Results: Receive Alias Map Definition (AMD) from node matching the Full Node ID in the data payload

TestObjective.Objective: Send AME message with Full Node ID of non existent node in the data payload

Test.Name: Verify Node
Test.Description: Tests target for correct implementation of the VerifyNodeID message

TestObjective.Objective: Send Global Identify Nodes message with empty payload
TestObjective.Results: All nodes on network reply with the target of interest included

TestObjective.Objective: Send Global Identify Nodes message with Full Node ID of node under test in data payload
TestObjective.Results: Verified Node ID from target node on the network

TestObjective.Objective: Send Global Identify Nodes message with Full Node ID of non existent node in the data payload
Send Addressed Identify Nodes message with empty payload
TestObjective.Results: Verified Node ID from target node on the network

TestObjective.Objective: Send Addressed Identify Nodes message with Full Node ID in the data payload
TestObjective.Results: Verified Node ID from target node on the network

TestObjective.Objective: Send Addressed Identify Nodes message with Full Node ID in the data payload to the incorrect alias address
TestObjective.Results: Verified Node ID from target node on the network

TestObjective.Objective: Send incorrectly Addressed Identify Nodes message with empty payload
Send incorrectly Addressed Identify Nodes message with Full Node ID in the data payload
Send incorrectly Addressed Identify Nodes message with Full Node ID in the data payload to the incorrect alias address

Test.Name: Protocol Identification Protocol (PIP)
Test.Description: Requests what protocols a node supports, optional but recommended implementation

TestObjective.Objective: Test that NUT responds to PIP message addressed to it
TestObjective.Results: Receive protocols supported by the node (or no response if does not support)

TestObjective.Objective: Test that NUT does not respond to PIP message addressed to another
Test that NUT understands start and end bits in PIP message

Test.Name: Standard Frame Test
Test.Description: Sends standard frames that a node should ignore

TestObjective.Objective: Test that NUT does not reply to stardard CAN frames

Test.Name: Unknown MTI Addressed
Test.Description: Sends undefined MTI values through an addressed message

TestObjective.Objective: Test that NUT does not reply to unknown MTI values
